name: Idol Run VR
description:
Race to the gold in VR using your climbing skills! Challenge your friends and compare times to see who can reach the Idol fastest! Take big risks for big payoff, or go slow and steady to win the race.

This game was started over a weekend at the summer 2018 Ucf Vs. Usf game jam by a team of 6 people and has now begun growing into a bigger project!

---

___Controls___:

Hold in the grip buttons on the side of the controllers and move your arms in a running motion to move forward. 

Pull and hold the trigger when grabbing a climbable object to climb. Release the trigger to drop or do a throwing motion with the release to propel yourself forward. 

Menu is on the top button of the left controller and the selection ray is with the touch pad of the right controller. Pull in the trigger to make a menu selection.

Reload to the last checkpoint with the top button of the right controller.
